snippet.title: Piozila Trailer | PC/Linux/android/iOS
snippet.description:
Help a chubby chameleon run away from humans.
More information on http://menamenagames.com

Piozila is a puzzle game similar to Sokoban, with a chubby chameleon and a lovely colorful graphics. Playable on PC, Linux, android and iOS.

Developed by Mena Mena Games, a game development studio based in Madagascar, in the South East Africa region.

Link
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1560850
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.MenaMenaGames.Piozila
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/piozila/id1581324375
